All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants
public class VolumeControlButton
extends BasicArrowButton

VolumeControlButton allows creation of a small upward or downward pointing arrow for use as a volume control.

See Also:
BasicArrowButton, Serialized Form
